description:
Business Analyst - Financial Services (Protiviti India)

Protiviti India is seeking experienced Business Analysts (3+ years for BA, 5+ years for Senior BA) to join our growing team. Immediate joiners preferred (within 30 days). Travel may be required.




About the Role:

You'll leverage your financial services expertise (Party/Client, Trade, Settlements, Payments, Instrument & Pricing, Market/Credit Risk) and data analytics skills within wholesale banking to drive impactful solutions. Experience with CRM, Global Markets, CMB, and Global Banking business lines is highly desired. You will contribute to technical product development and delivery.




Key Skills:

Strong data analysis skills (wholesale banking focus)
SQL proficiency; ETL, GCP, Hadoop experience required
Python, Jupyter, Pandas, Numpy, PySpark/Scala a plus
Agile & DevOps experience
Financial Services domain knowledge (as listed above)

Ready to accelerate your career in a fast-paced global banking environment? Apply now!
